name: Rokik
description:
A small game for Windows / Android

Rokik is a small game where you control a pair of shoes as you walk down a street, while kicking a rock, and avoiding obstacles, for as long as you can.

 

Controls:

Click / Tap and drag shoe to move.

Reminder:

  • Rokik is currently very early into development, the current version has placeholder assets, unfinished features, and does not represent the final product.
  • Please report any bugs you find by leaving a comment, or reaching out to me on Twitter. Thank you!

 

Credits:

Nick (@enedee) - Art, Programming, Design
